locations.name: Helsinki
locations.description: Finland's vibrant capital city, offering a blend of neoclassical architecture, modern design, and coastal charm. The starting point for the tour.

locations.name: Saariselkä
locations.description: A resort village deep within Finnish Lapland, famous for its Arctic wilderness experiences, Northern Lights viewing opportunities, husky sledding, reindeer encounters, and access to Sámi culture. Chosen as a representative location for the 'heart of Finnish Lapland' activities described.
